feed.title: SAP Community - SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud
feed.subtitle: SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud Q&A in SAP Community

entry.title: Physical inventory document not split by subcontractor (special stock O) in version 2508
entry.content:
When creating physical inventory documents, the system does not split the documents by subcontractor (special stock type O).
Is this the expected behavior in the current version?
I seem to recall that the documents were split by subcontractor in versions prior to 2508.

entry.title: Plan Amount is not displayed in the "Project - Plan/Actual" App.
entry.content:
Plan Amount for project budget is not displayed in the "Project - Plan/Actual" App.

entry.title: What is the standard process to adjust the actual cost for professional service project
entry.content:
Our Public Cloud customer use professional service projects.

They have a business process question, for an example:

The cost rate maintained for project manager Bob is 2000CNY/days. If time recording for Bob is 10 days this month. The final cost in the billing will be 2000*10=20000CNY.

But in the end of month, the actual cost is 1700CNY/days via the finance settlement. Could you help to suggest what is the standard process to adjust the actual cost?

Is this via APP: Reassign Costs and Revenues or other solution?

entry.title: Person Responsible in Lease contract management
entry.content:
Recently we have deleted a user which was entered in Person Responsible in Contract. We had to manually change person responsible one by one for 300 contracts, since the user id dont exist anymore.

  1. Is there any option to mass change the field?
  2. In future if a user leaves organization, we need to remove the user? In this case how can we deal with it?

------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Learn more about the SAP Support user and program here.

entry.title: How to reverse ERS related goods receipt documents
entry.content:
Dears,

We met a ERS related problem. We used ERS Evaluated Receipt Settlement function, post goods receipt, and through APP "schedule supplier invoice jobs", to schedule ERS jobs, post invoice automatically by job.

But today, we found the purchase order is incorrect, need to reverse the invoice and goods receipt.

When we tried to reverse the invoice, we found the error message "M8.414", the message said, if you want invoice creation completely using ERS, then you must cancel the goods receipt and not the invoice document. ERS will then create the relevant cancellation invoice document for the cancelled goods movement". 

However, when we use APP "post goods movement" to cancel the goods receipt document, system also generated the error message "M7021 Deficit PU IR Quantity  XXXXX".

Could you please guide how to reverse ERS related goods movement document? Is it another APP? 

Thank you very much.

Best Regards,

Grace

entry.title: Form processing - S/4HANA Public Cloud
entry.content:
Hi experts,

I am currently working on form processing with Adobe Livecycle Designer in conjunction with SAP Fiori in the public cloud.
Unfortunately, I am having problems with the data connection and am not sure how exactly it works.
Perhaps some of you have already had experience with this or can provide me with links to instructions or tips?

Thanks a lot!

entry.title: Error in calling Outbound Delivery public API in iflow in integration suite
entry.content:
I have created a simple iflow where odata public API API_OUTBOUND_DELIVERY_SRV;v=0002 is called in odata v2 receiver adapter to fetch Outbound delivery details from SAP S4 HANA public cloud system. I am able to get Outbound Delivery number using GET call. Now, to fetch item details, in resource path, i selected sub level as 1 and then selected item number field in 'to_DeliveryDocumentItem' sub-level.
Below is the query that is getting generated
$select=DeliveryDocument,to_DeliveryDocumentItem/DeliveryDocument,to_DeliveryDocumentItem/DeliveryDocumentItem&$expand=to_DeliveryDocumentItem&$filter=DeliveryDocument eq '80000000'

No payload is passed to this iflow.

I am getting below error when iflow is triggered through postman
com.sap.it.rt.adapter.http.api.exception.HttpResponseException: An internal server error occured: An exception of type 'WstxUnexpectedCharException' occurred.. cause:com.ctc.wstx.exc.WstxUnexpectedCharException: Unexpected character '&' (code 38) (expected a name start character) at [row, col{unknown source}]: [1,182].  The MPL ID for the failed message is : AGiSChZ7DkZ-t0vCX2lUJ7YK8I9d

Kindly help in resolving this issue

entry.title: Principal Decrease cannot be posted to accounting after reversal
entry.content:
Reversal if Principal decrease do not create a new position flow.

entry.title: Accessing deployed SAP Build Apps app in SAP Public Cloud
entry.content:
Hello, how does deploying a SAP Build Apps app work? It seems to generate a URL when deployed via BTP. Is the app located in a Workzone?

Is it possible to use a deployed app's URL to access it via SAP Public Cloud Custom tile? If so, I imagine that the browser would open a new window  with the Build App application... Is it possible to open the custom made app within the SAP Public Cloud window? Similarly to how other native Public Cloud apps work?

How suitable SAP Build Apps even is as an extensibility option for SAP Public Cloud?

Thank you.

entry.title: Issue Granting Access to Users Imported from Starter System to IAS
entry.content:
Dear team,

We are currently facing difficulties granting access to the users that were created in the Starter System and later imported into Identity Authentication Service (IAS).

As shown in the attached screenshot, the users do appear in the system under the “Maintain Business Users” app. However, they are still not able to log in despite the User Name is the Same in the IAS. as in the Business User created un the Starter System. Also the roles were assinged to the Business Users before exporting them to the IAS.

Could you please help us understand what might be missing?

In particular, does the column labeled “Connected” have any impact on whether the users can access the system? Only System Administartor user appears as “Yes” in that field, while the others show no value.

Thank you in advance for your support.

Best regards,
Oscar Quijano

entry.title: withholding Tax Report for Country - Nigeria (Activated via CLT Tool)
entry.content:
We would like to knowr the availability of the Withholding Tax Report specific to Country: Nigeria NG in our SAP S/4HANA Public Cloud system 2508

Please note that the country configuration for Nigeria has already been activated through the CLT Tool. However, we are currently unable to locate any standard report related to Withholding Tax applicable to Nigeria.

entry.title: Manage payments for import purchases
entry.content:
Hi everyone.

We need to resolve an import scenario using S4 public cloud.

One shipment contains multiple purchase orders, and we need to issue payments or advances for the entire shipment.
Question: How can we associate multiple purchase orders with a shipment?

On the other hand, we use conditions to plan import expenses paid to different suppliers within purchase orders containing many items. Question: How can we mass update import-related conditions? We need to place the customs agent or freight forwarder inside those conditions?

@Luana_Lovison

entry.title: Automatically mark process flow indicators in a purchase order item.
entry.content:
Hello community.

I have a question. I have been researching how to automatically mark fields (Goods Receipt, Non-Valuated Goods Receipt, Goods-Receipt-Based Invoice Verification, Invoice Receipt, Final Invoice, Delivery Completed) that are at the purchase order item level.

 

Does anyone know if it is possible to configure this at the document type, product, supplier, etc. level?

 

I appreciate your help.

Regards,

Fernando.

entry.title: Batch Jobs for processing Billing document of Billing Document Requests
entry.content:
Hi SAP gurus,

My client has asked for a way to schedule batch jobs for creating billing documents of service contract.
The Billing Document Requests will be created via the app Schedule Billing Document Request Creation (Services Contract) manually as needed by client.
I want to use app Schedule Billing Creation to create billing documents of service contract.
At the same time, I want to collect   Billing Document Requests of service contract only.
Could you tell me how to set parameters?
We use the billing type of billing document is F2.

 

Thanks Lily

entry.title: Custom Field in Migration template
entry.content:
I create a custom field via Custom Fields app. And that field appears in Migration template.

Issue is that if we don't fill value to that custom field, can't upload the migration template. 

I don't set as mandatory to custom field.

Could you please help me to solve this issue?

Best Regards.

Khaing Zin

entry.title: How to add calculation field and code in Custom CDS view
entry.content:
Dear Community,

We need to add calculation field in Custom CDS view, could you please guide us how to write the code?

For example, if the Debit/credit code = "H", then the quantity = Quantity * (-1). 

Is there any document to explain the coding for Custom CDS view? Thank you.

Best Regards,

Grace

entry.title: What's API to create billing items in commercial project
entry.content: What's API to create billing items in commercial project. Could you provide detail payload?

entry.title: SAP Cloud - Multiple Delivery addresses in Purchase Order
entry.content:
Dear community, 

our client is on SAP S/4HANA Cloud, public Edition.

We are facing the following challenge: We have 1 storage location but 6-8 different delivery points within the same storage location. We need the delivery address to be entered in the Purchase Order and print it on the PO form so that the supplier can send the goods to the right place.

As per standard, the delivery address in the PO is taken from the storage location (SLOC Configuration) - and we can maintain only one address for the SLOC in customizing. Of course, one possibility is to create an address table entry for each delivery point. The purchase could enter the address number during  PO creation. But that would mean that the PO creator has manual work: the right address needs to be entered n in each PO...

Does anyone have any idea to avoid or at least minimize the manual efforts?

Thanks and regards,

entry.title: PO header text & some other fields need to be displayed in PO approval Task Card
entry.content:
Currently for PO flexible workflow in the task card of  my inbox Fiori is not showing some fields like Material, Header text & PR Creator in the Approval Task Card from the Purchase order. We should be able to see the Header text & PR creator & some fields directly in the Approval Task Card while approving the PO the sample is  attached for your reference.
